title: Marzipan Sandwich Biscuits
ingredients: ['For the Biscuits', '500g plain flour', '200g caster sugar', '1 pinch salt', '1 egg', '200g butter', 'For the Filling', '250g marzipan', '100g icing sugar', '2 tablespoons dark rum', '2 tablespoons sugar', '125g apricot jam', 'For the Glaze', '125g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons apricot liqueur', 'To Decorate', '30g pistachios, finely chopped']
